Name: Minimize Project Duration
Description: Reduce overall duration between start and end dates of all projects

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Ensure all team members are optimally allocated to tasks

Name: Maximize Feature Delivery Speed
Description: Increase number of features delivered per sprint

Name: Minimize Employee Idle Time
Description: Reduce time employees are not assigned to tasks

Name: Maximize Skill Utilization
Description: Assign tasks to employees based on their competencies

Name: Maximize Customer Satisfaction
Description: Align feature development with stakeholder interest

Name: Minimize Blockers
Description: Reduce number of blockers during sprint development

Name: Maximize Backlog Turnover
Description: Ensure a high rate of backlog item completion per sprint
